document.full_text: hundreds of health organizations and professionals signed a letter to mcdonald's corp , asking the fast-food chain to stop marketing junk food to children, including with happy meals and the ronald mcdonald clown character.
document.title: mcdonald's comes under fire ahead of annual meeting
lines_and_colors: hundreds of health organizations and professionals signed a letter to mcdonald's corp , asking the fast-food chain to stop marketing junk food to children, including with happy meals and the ronald mcdonald clown character.
